NON-COMPLIANT: Frontmatter deficiency. The revision_summary field contains 'Initial draft' which does not comply with SOP-001 Section 5.1 and SOP-002 Section 8. For documents at v1.0 or higher, revision_summary must begin with the authorizing CR ID for traceability. Since this is the CR itself, it should reference CR-024 (e.g., 'CR-024: Relocate QMS CLI to qms-cli/ Directory'). All other aspects of the document are compliant. Correct the revision_summary and re-route for post-review.
